description:
As a full-service law firm, Grauman Law P.C. serves clients in Kew Gardens and throughout New York. We handle some of life's most difficult and complex issues, such as bankruptcy, criminal defense and cybersecurity. Our attorneys, who have more than 50 years of combined experience, have advocated for clients in courtrooms, before administrative panels, around the negotiating table and in countless other settings.

People come to our law firm from all walks of life. Families, individuals and businesses benefit from our client-focused approach to each case, which includes the following:

• Cost-effective legal strategies
• Knowledgeable attorneys who offer sophisticated yet personal service
• Honest advice that prioritizes the client's goals

As industry professionals, we have worked with clients from areas that include real estate, technology, transportation and art. Because we have a diverse team of attorneys, we are able to give each person who comes to us the attention the case deserves.

Grauman Law P.C. begins every case with a free initial consultation. This is a chance for our team to get to know your circumstances and offer some insight into how we may be able to help. We also have the ability to meet with you virtually if an appointment at our law firm is not feasible. As a matter of convenience, we accept credit cards and can provide services in Spanish.

Grauman Law P.C. is a debt relief agency. We help people seek bankruptcy protection under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
